lead_paragraph: For the second time in three years, the St. Louis Rams released wide receiver Isaac Bruce, the last player remaining from the team’s 1995 move from Los Angeles. Bruce, 35, had been due a $2 million roster bonus Friday, and the Rams were unsuccessful in attempts to restructure his contract. Bruce is third on the N.F.L. career list with 14,070 yards receiving.
